<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Profile tracker that manages profiles and its associated context. It</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// provides interfaces used by sample profile loader to query context profile or</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// base profile for given function or location; it also manages context tree</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// manipulation that is needed to accommodate inline decisions so we have</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// accurate post-inline profile for functions. Internally context profiles</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// are organized in a trie, with each node representing profile for specific</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// calling context and the context is identified by path from root to the node.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/samplecontexttracker"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/samplecontexttracker/#af52a487243093c41b1250ff0f5d25f10">SampleContextTracker</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
